;;1. PUA and emotional blackmail;

;

;To be honest, the word PUA has been widely abused in the past two years. When parents often suppress their children, they say they are parent-child PUAs. When their bosses accuse their subordinates, they say they are workplace PUAs. When couples quarrel and refuse to give in, they say they are PUAs who want to control themselves.

;

;PUA (pick-up artist) does exist, but PUA mostly only uses methods such as pretending to be high-value to attract pie, chatting and flirting, providing positive emotions, and moral kidnapping in short-term relationships, so that they can A speculator who advances a relationship quickly and obtains sexual or financial benefits from it.

;

;PUAs that can control people to commit suicide by using so-called five-step traps and other PUA magic techniques exist in theory, but in reality, the cases of depression or even suicide that we see are not What PUA does is the result of ;more dangerous, emotional blackmail;, or, in other words, it is the result of some people who are accustomed to emotional blackmail in their relationships learning PUA techniques.

;

;It is difficult to distinguish PUA from emotional blackmail based on behavior alone. The two behaviors are very similar. ;Common behaviors are as follows:;

;

;; If he is unhappy, he will yell at you, say harsh words, or hide;;to;;sulk;;

;

;; I;;have a;;strongly possessive;; desire for you and interfere with your every move;;; p>;

;;Look down on your opinions;;,;;Belittle your achievements;;

;

;;Think you;; strong>;;is the;;culprit that causes all the;;problems;;

;

;;with confidence Intervene in your life;;

;

;;Ignore and deny your feelings. ;

;

;So to distinguish whether a person is a PUA or an emotional blackmailer, you cannot just look at behavior, but you must look at;motivation and emotional stability in combination with the interaction model. ;

;

;A real PUA is an actor, with a clear purpose of profit, and a free and easy mood. Therefore, there are clear demands behind his actions, as long as you satisfy his demands. , he will adjust his behavior as reinforcement, and rarely lose control of his behavior and emotions to the point of hysteria.

;

;People who engage in emotional blackmail often do not have clear demands behind their actions. They just want to vent their emotions. Even if you try to satisfy his demands, he will not adjust his behavior accordingly, and his emotions will often get out of control. .

;

;For this reason, in comparison, emotional blackmail causes greater harm to a partner than PUA.

;

;;PUA’s behavior was self-aware;;;;intentional;;,;;There are traces to follow and the mood is stable; while the behavior of emotional blackmail is an unintentional act that lacks self-;;knowledge;;and is unorganized and often emotionally out of control; ;. ;

;

;PUAs know that they are doing bad things, so they will have a sense of guilt, guilt, and fear, and their behavior will be controlled and they will do things in a measured manner. Moreover, any normal social girl with some social experience can easily see through the crappy scam of PUA.

;

;Although people who suffer from emotional blackmail are objectively hurting their partners, subjectively they firmly believe that they are maintaining the relationship and doing it for the good of their partners. Therefore, it is often easy to lose control and cause injury to themselves or their partners. Even if someone is killed and their partner is hurt, they will not be able to get rid of it easily because they truly feel their "love" for them.

;

; 

;

;;2. The root of emotional blackmail;

;

;Why do emotionally blackmailed partners have such deformed "love" ”What about a person’s way?

;

;This needs to be explained in conjunction with the typical behavioral patterns of emotional blackmailers.

;

;;Emotional blackmailers have nine ways to blackmail their partners: violence, verbal attacks, cynicism, pretending to be stupid, not allowed to cry out, punishment, self-punishment, victim mentality, and false promises< /strong>;;. ;

;

;;1. Threat of violence;

;

;As long as you don’t follow his way, he will develop violent tendencies, such as yelling at you Yelling, smashing things, slamming doors, clenching fists, banging on tables, etc. Although he may not attack you at the moment, his behavior conveys this message to you: "If you do this again next time, I will not be polite to you."

;

;;2. Verbal attack;

;

;He needs to suppress you to demonstrate his power in order to establish a sense of "I am right and you are wrong." ", so you have to listen to me" relationship. He will frequently accuse you of various things you do, such as "Buy, buy, buy, just know how to buy, sooner or later this family will be ruined by you", "You actually accepted his gift, what a lewd stinker." "Bitch", "If you can't do this, what use do you think you have?" ”.

;

;;3. Sarcasm;

;

;Sometimes he will not take the initiative to attack you, but will express his dissatisfaction through a weird attitude and an unhappy face.

;

;If you take him to your idol's concert, he will not want to accompany you, so he will constantly pick on your idol and mock the audience for being so excited that they look like idiots. .

;

;;4. Pretending to be stupid;

;

;In order to avoid being accused by you, he will not admit any facts that are not good for him, or he will tamper with them. In fact, either they accuse you of being petty, such as "I didn't yell at you. It was you who brought your best friend to our date without permission. I have already forgiven you, but I didn't expect you to still do it." It’s hard to get over being so petty and petty by bringing up old things again.”

;

;;5. Don’t cry out in pain;

;

;They do not allow you to complain when you are wronged, nor do they allow you to feel sad and uncomfortable, such as "Ouch" , you can’t help but say, then I won’t tell you about your problems in the future, you can fend for yourself.”, “You just can’t listen to criticism from others, you have a glass heart.”

;

;;6.;; Punishment;

;

;After deciding that you "made a mistake", does he ask you to change? Instead, it requires you to impose self-punishment for your mistake. If your punishment is not strong enough, he will give you more punishment suggestions to make you hurt yourself. For example, "You take ten nude photos for me to make me believe that you will never chat with other people", "You have to take a sex video with me to make me forgive you."

;

;;7.;; Self-punishment;

;

;They also punish themselves, but not because they realize they are wrong Just to control you better. For example, "If you don't agree to get back together with me, I will slit my wrists to show you, and I will post on WeChat to let everyone know that I died because of you.", "I am taking sleeping pills now, good night, I will still find you in the next life. You”.

;

;;8.;; Victim mentality;

;

;They will often be in pain and unable to solve their pain, Asking you to address his pain. For example, "It's really painful that you can't give me a sense of security. Can you disfigure me to make me feel at ease?" ”, “If it weren’t for you, there would be no need for me to go to the company and suffer this kind of anger! Why don't you care about me! ”

;

;;9.;; False promises;

;

;In order to ease their emotions, they will give something they cannot Fulfilled promises, that is, giving promises, are not a reflection of their determination to change themselves, but a strategy and a delaying tactic for them to control their partners. For example, "As long as you give me all your money, I promise to delete these women from WeChat immediately", "As long as you and your parents ask for 600,000 to come up with the down payment, I promise to do it for the rest of my life." Hello”.

;

; 

;

;The reason why emotional blackmailers have so many motivations and strategies to control others is because their caregivers have controlled them in this way since childhood.

;

;Their caregivers would intimidate their young children by breaking things, which is ;violence;;

;

;Their caregivers would say, “You are A bad guy, the family business is getting worse and worse as soon as he is born. This is a ;verbal attack;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, "Come on, it's you. If If you can succeed, then all the beggars downstairs will get rich." This is ;cynicism;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, "It's because you are ignorant, so we Hit you! This is "our love and responsibility", this is ;acting stupid;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, "Just say a few words and you will be like this," I won’t care about you from now on, I don’t have such a useless child like you.” This is ;Don’t cry out in pain;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, “You are today If you don't copy this text a hundred times, you won't be allowed to sleep! ”, this is;punishment;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, “If you dare to play games after school again, I will kill myself in front of you.”, this is< strong>;Self-punishment;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, "If it weren't for making money for you to study, why would we work so hard?" ”, this is ;victim mentality;;

;

;Their caregivers will say, "As long as you pass the exam this time, I won't stop you from playing games in the future." ;, this is;false promise;.

;

;You may feel that the lines in it are somewhat familiar. Indeed, most of us have actually been hurt by our parents' unintentional emotional blackmail.

;

;However, the lucky thing for most of us is that either our genes can tolerate bad environments, or our parents will give us a lot of correct love in addition to emotional blackmail, or in addition to being caregivers, There are other elders who really care about us and give us love, so we can get along with our partners in the relationship and learn the correct way to get along with them, with a little bit of the bad habit of emotional blackmail.

;

;The unfortunate thing about people with emotional blackmail is that their genes determine that their personality is easily affected by the environment, and the early environment created by their caregivers is basically only emotional blackmail and rarely true love. , coupled with the lack of care from other elders, they can only use this wrong way of love to hurt others and themselves.

;

;; ;

;

;;3. How to deal with emotional blackmailers;

;

;If you are unfortunate enough to If you encounter a partner who is emotionally blackmailing, you need to focus on self-protection first rather than rescuing the blackmailer. You need to first evaluate whether the relationship has threatened you and whether you can reverse it with your own abilities. A pathological way of getting along.

;

;Here I will provide a simple way to distinguish between high and low levels of emotional blackmail.

;

;;1. Characteristics of a healthy relationship: The other person respects your thoughts and feelings, accepts your family and friends, has confidence in you, and recognizes your abilities;; ;

;

;When a relationship has these characteristics, congratulations, you are in a healthy intimate relationship. Even if each other occasionally engages in emotional blackmail, it will not destroy the relationship, just like most people. Everyone's body is prone to ailments and pains, and sometimes noisy relationships are quite viable, so there's no need to be too afraid of emotional blackmail, as long as you learn to communicate and get along well, and maintain a long-term relationship.

;

;;2. Emotional existence;;;;Characteristics of blackmail: the other party cannot accept any rejection from you, hinders your interaction with family and friends, and belittles you thoughts, mocking you in public, checking your;;private social messages, asking for private photos or videos;;. ;

;

;When a relationship has these characteristics, you need to start to be vigilant, communicate more with family and friends, ask them what they think of the relationship, and try to take anti-blackmail measures (see below for details) ) to carry out self-protection and guide the other party to psychological counseling or emotional counseling. If the self-protection is ineffective and the other party is unwilling to seek counseling, then you have to start thinking about breaking away from the relationship to protect yourself.

;

;;3. Characteristics of serious emotional blackmail: When you point out problems in the relationship, he will humiliate and laugh at you, thinking you are irrational. , lose control of your emotions when encountering something unpleasant, or threaten suicide, physical violence, or threaten with private photos or videos. You are prohibited from contacting others;;. ;

;

;When a relationship has these characteristics, you must take immediate anti-blackmail measures. If the other person is unwilling to cooperate, then don’t hesitate any longer, and don’t say whether you love her or not. Tell your relatives and friends around you and ask them to help you get out of this relationship. If necessary, you may even consider calling the police.

;

;If you are sure that your partner's emotional blackmail is within your control, take the following anti-blackmail measures to protect yourself.

;

; 

;

;;1. Rewrite the "blame-exonerate-blame" script;

;

;Think about it, here is Isn’t it a scene that often appears in your lives?

;

;After he came back from work, he found that dinner was not cooked, so he accused you of being incompetent. You were anxious to excuse yourself and said: "I was very tired all day, and I couldn't take care of so much." ", and then this sentence becomes the target for the other party to attack you again, "How can you be as tired as me when you are tired? I work hard all day long, but when I get home I don’t even have a bite to eat. I really don’t know why I married you.”

;

;The daily smoke of gunpowder was thus aroused.

;

;When many people who please people face an emotionally blackmailing partner, they are always frightened by the negative emotions of the other person, and then they start to explain and apologize. But in fact, the reason why the other person has so many and strong negative emotions is because he is weaker and more afraid than you.

;

;He is worried that he will lose you and that he cannot take care of himself. Because he is desperate, he needs to pretend to be strong to control you. Therefore, you don't need to be frightened by his anger. The more angry he is, the weaker he is inside. You will not be hurt by such a weak person. Instead, you have to become a rational adult to guide him.

;

;When he accuses and attacks you for no reason, don’t rush to excuse yourself. Try to agree with part of what he said, and then calmly discuss with him how to solve it.

;

;If he accuses you of not cooking, you can respond like this: I really didn’t have time to cook dinner today (agree), let’s go out to a restaurant tonight (resolve), everyone is tired, let’s go and have a meal of.

;

;As long as you don’t take his attacks seriously and coax him as a coquettish child, you can avoid many conflicts.

;

; 

;

;;2. Express rejection when he is emotional;

;

;Usually when he yells at you , when he accuses you in a barrage, in the past you might have retorted a few words first, and then cried in front of him when you were really wronged. Such a cooperative attitude will only make him get worse, so please ;pluck up the courage and be righteous. Strictly express your rejection to him. ;

;

;“I’m not here to listen to you yelling, you can tell me what you want me to do”

;

;“You can’t yell at me, like this It will make me not want to communicate even more”

;

;“Even if you tear your throat, it will not help solve the problem”

;

;“We will discuss this again when you calm down. Question, I won’t respond to you now”

;

;After finishing speaking, go back to your room and lock the door. No matter how he curses or threatens outside, or turns into crying or pleading, nothing will happen. Ignore him until he calms down completely.

;

;If you are worried that you can't bear it and want to be completely clean, you can leave home first, go back to your parents' house, or stay at a friend's house temporarily. During this period, do not answer his calls or reply to him. any news until he expresses serious remorse and takes action.

;

; 

;

;;3. Strengthen his positive ;;contribution to you;;;

;

;Even a man who seems to be useless like this will occasionally do a few things correctly, and at this time he needs to be rewarded. For example, when you carefully prepare for your anniversary, when you take time out of your busy schedule to spend time with your children, when you read carefully and take notes in order to correct your own problems.

;

;You can use the following sentences to express your feelings to reinforce his correct behavior:

;

;● I really appreciate it when you cook seriously.

;

;● Thank you for preparing this gift so carefully.

;

;● I like it when you are in a happy mood and naughty like a child.

;

;● It’s nice of you to spend time with me.

;

;● When you said you loved me, I was really happy.

;

;The seemingly powerful emotional blackmailer is actually extremely fragile inside and lacks recognition. Therefore, when he does the right thing, the recognition you give him is not only satisfying his needs, but also Guide him to pay correctly.

;

;After you take the above anti-blackmail measures, if the other party can respect your need for self-protection and is willing to change his usual emotional consuming behavior pattern for you, then the relationship will develop in the right direction. .

;

;If you have taken anti-blackmail measures, but the other party still ignores your thoughts and feelings, and has no sincerity in wanting to solve the problem together, then I advise you to save your life first.

;

;A bad relationship has a far-reaching impact on a person beyond our imagination. Regardless of whether the other party in the relationship is due to a personality defect, a PUA, or a control mode learned from the family of origin, the emotional blackmailer is a vampire in the relationship.

;

;Either change your response measures to influence the other person, or stick to the bottom line and give up the relationship, and don't let your life and life become a sacrifice to the vampire.

;

;You have to remember that you always have control over your feelings and don't have to be afraid of anyone.

;

;When you leave anyone, you are still yourself.
